original_text: The gold altar for incense was in there. The Covenant Box was there too. The box had gold on all its sides. Inside the box was the gold pot that contained the special food called manna. The box also contained Aaron's stick that had grown leaves. It also contained the two flat stones on which God had written the rules of his agreement with his people.
korean_text: 금 향로와 사면을 금으로 싼 언약궤가 있고 그 안에 만나를 담은 금 항아리와 아론의 싹난 지팡이와 언약의 돌판들이 있고

sentences.original_text: The gold altar for incense was in there.
sentences.korean_translation: 분향을 위한 금 제단이 그곳에 있었다.

sentences.original_text: The Covenant Box was there too.
The box had gold on all its sides.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 상자는 모든 면에 금이 있었다.

sentences.original_text: Inside the box was the gold pot.
The pot contained the special food called manna.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 항아리에는 만나라는 특별한 음식이 담겨 있었다.

sentences.original_text: The box also contained Aaron's stick.
sentences.korean_translation: 상자에는 또한 아론의 지팡이가 담겨 있었다.

sentences.original_text: It also contained the two flat stones.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것에는 또한 두 개의 평평한 돌판이 담겨 있었다.

sentences.original_text: God had written on the stones.
He wrote the rules of his agreement.
The agreement was with his people.
